title: Sapugaskanda oil refinery to commence operations again
body_lines: The operations at the Sapugaskanda oil refinery will commence again and producing Fuel Oil will start in six days, Power and Energy Minister Kanchana Wijesekera said.
The operations at the fuel refinery were suspended on March 20.
The minister said today that the Sapugaskanda Refinery will commence operations for the first time since March 20th with a Crude Oil cargo to be unloaded tomorrow.
